description: Wake-up with America's first news - Host Gordon Deal goes beyond the headlines with the day's first look at news and business news from the U.S. and around the world; bringing a lively blend of intelligent information, humor, and expert analysis to morning radio.
title: This Morning With Gordon Deal

episodes.title: This Morning with Gordon Deal November 12, 2020
episodes.description: Georgia to recount all votes in Presidential race by hand, Joe Biden focuses on transition, the Early-Bird Special is now everyone's favorite restaurant reservation.

episodes.description: Supreme Court Justices question GOP States' case against ACA, President-Elect Joe Biden not worried about Trump during the transition, and Missouri deputy surprises son after Afghanistan deployment in emotional reunion.

episodes.title: This Morning with Gordon Deal November 10, 2020
